          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Halv liksidig triangel i enhetscirkeln</string>
            <string language="en">Half liksidig triangle in enhetscirkeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halbes liksidig Dreieck im enhetscirkeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Demi de triangle de liksidig dans 
l'enhetscirkeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meio triângulo do liksidig no enhetscirkeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Triangolo mezzo del liksidig nel enhetscirkeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μισό liksidig τρίγωνο στο enhetscirkeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Medio triángulo del liksidig en enhetscirkeln</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Om vi placerar triangeln i enhetscirkeln i 1:a kvadranten blir det lättare att komma ihåg värdena. Modul 5 - Trigonometri - Trianglar.Matematik D - Åsö.</string>
            <string language="en">If we place the triangle in enhetscirkeln in 1: a the quadrant becomes the easier to remember the values. 

Module 5 - Trigonometri - triangles.

Mathematics D - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Matematik D</string>
            <string language="sv">matematik</string>
            <string language="sv">trigonometri</string>
            <string language="sv">triangel</string>
            <string language="sv">trianglar</string>
            <string language="sv">enhetscirkel</string>
            <string language="sv">hypotenusa</string>
            <string language="sv">cosinus</string>
            <string language="sv">sinus</string>
            <string language="en">Mathematics D</string>
            <string language="en">mathematics</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometri</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
            <string language="en">triangles</string>
            <string language="en">enhetscirkel</string>
            <string language="en">hypotenusa</string>
            <string language="en">cosinus</string>
            <string language="en">sinus </string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wenn wir das Dreieck in enhetscirkeln in 1 legen:
wird der Quadrant das einfachere, sich an die Werte zu erinnern.
Modul 5 - Trigonometri - triangles.Mathematics D - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Si nous plaçons la triangle dans l'enhetscirkeln
dans 1 : le quart de cercle devient le plus facile de se 
rappeler les valeurs. Module 5 - Trigonometri - 
triangles.Mathematics D - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Se nós colocarmos o triângulo no enhetscirkeln 
em 1: o quadrante transforma-se o mais fácil de recordar os 
valores. Módulo 5 - Trigonometri - triangles.Mathematics 
D - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Se disponiamo il triangolo nel enhetscirkeln in 
1: il quadrante si transforma in nel più facile da ricordarsi 
dei valori. Modulo 5 - Trigonometri - 
triangles.Mathematics D - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εάν τοποθετούμε το τρίγωνο στο enhetscirkeln σε 1: 
το τεταρτημόριο γίνεται το ευκολότερο να θυμηθεί τις τιμές.
Ενότητα 5 - Trigonometri - μαθηματικά δ τριγώνων - 
Εsφ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Si ponemos el triángulo en enhetscirkeln en 1: 
el cuadrante se convierte en el más fácil recordar los 
valores. Módulo 5 - Trigonometri - triangles.Mathematics 
D - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
